5044  /* $'', $'\0', $'\000\x00' and the like */
5045  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5046  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5047  }
5048 
5049  return 1;
5050 # undef as_string
5051 }
5052 #else
5053 # define parse_dollar_squote(as_string, dest, input) 0
5054 #endif /* BASH_DOLLAR_SQUOTE */
5055 
5056 /* Return code: 0 for OK, 1 for syntax error */
5057 #if BB_MMU
5058 #define parse_dollar(as_string, dest, input, quote_mask) \
5059  parse_dollar(dest, input, quote_mask)
5060 #define as_string NULL
5061 #endif
5062 static int parse_dollar(o_string *as_string,
5063  o_string *dest,
5064  struct in_str *input, unsigned char quote_mask)
5065 {
5066  int ch = i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input); /* first character after the $ */
5067 
5068  debug_printf_parse("parse_dollar entered: ch='%c' quote_mask:0x%x\n", ch, quote_mask);
5069  if (isalpha(ch)) {
5070  make_var:
5071  ch = i_getch(input);
5072  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5073  /*make_var1:*/
5074  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5075  while (1) {
5076  debug_printf_parse(": '%c'\n", ch);
5077  o_addchr(dest, ch | quote_mask);
5078  quote_mask = 0;
5079  ch = i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input);
5080  if (!isalnum(ch) && ch != '_') {
5081  /* End of variable name reached */
5082  break;
5083  }
5084  ch = i_getch(input);
5085  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5086  }
5087  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5088  } else if (isdigit(ch)) {
5089  make_one_char_var:
5090  ch = i_getch(input);
5091  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5092  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5093  debug_printf_parse(": '%c'\n", ch);
5094  o_addchr(dest, ch | quote_mask);
5095  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5096  } else switch (ch) {
5097  case '$': /* pid */
5098  case '!': /* last bg pid */
5099  case '?': /* last exit code */
5100  case '#': /* number of args */
5101  case '*': /* args */
5102  case '@': /* args */
5103  case '-': /* $- option flags set by set builtin or shell options (-i etc) */
5104  goto make_one_char_var;
5105  case '{': {
5106  char len_single_ch;
5107 
5108  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5109 
5110  ch = i_getch(input); /* eat '{' */
5111  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5112 
5113  ch = i_getch_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input); /* first char after '{' */
5114  /* It should be ${?}, or ${#var},
5115  * or even ${?+subst} - operator acting on a special variable,
5116  * or the beginning of variable name.
5117  */
5118  if (ch == EOF
5119  || (!strchr(_SPECIAL_VARS_STR, ch) && !isalnum(ch)) /* not one of those */
5120  ) {
5121  bad_dollar_syntax:
5122  syntax_error_unterm_str("${name}");
5123  debug_printf_parse("parse_dollar return 0: unterminated ${name}\n");
5124  return 0;
5125  }
5126  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5127  len_single_ch = ch;
5128  ch |= quote_mask;
5129 
5130  /* It's possible to just call add_till_closing_bracket() at this point.
5131  * However, this regresses some of our testsuite cases
5132  * which check invalid constructs like ${%}.
5133  * Oh well... let's check that the var name part is fine... */
5134 
5135  if (isdigit(len_single_ch)
5136  || (len_single_ch == '#' && isdigit(i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input)))
5137  ) {
5138  /* Execution engine uses plain xatoi_positive()
5139  * to interpret ${NNN} and {#NNN},
5140  * check syntax here in the parser.
5141  * (bash does not support expressions in ${#NN},
5142  * e.g. ${#$var} and {#1:+WORD} are not supported).
5143  */
5144  unsigned cnt = 9; /* max 9 digits for ${NN} and 8 for {#NN} */
5145  while (1) {
5146  o_addchr(dest, ch);
5147  debug_printf_parse(": '%c'\n", ch);
5148  ch = i_getch_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input);
5149  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5150  if (ch == '}')
5151  break;
5152  if (--cnt == 0)
5153  goto bad_dollar_syntax;
5154  if (len_single_ch != '#' && strchr(VAR_SUBST_OPS, ch))
5155  /* ${NN<op>...} is valid */
5156  goto eat_until_closing;
5157  if (!isdigit(ch))
5158  goto bad_dollar_syntax;
5159  }
5160  } else
5161  while (1) {
5162  unsigned pos;
5163 
5164  o_addchr(dest, ch);
5165  debug_printf_parse(": '%c'\n", ch);
5166 
5167  ch = i_getch(input);
5168  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5169  if (ch == '}')
5170  break;
5171  if (!isalnum(ch) && ch != '_') {
5172  unsigned end_ch;
5173  unsigned char last_ch;
5174  /* handle parameter expansions
5175  * http://www.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/009695399/utilities/xcu_chap02.html#tag_02_06_02
5176  */
5177  if (!strchr(VAR_SUBST_OPS, ch)) { /* ${var<bad_char>... */
5178  if (len_single_ch != '#'
5179  /*|| !strchr(SPECIAL_VARS_STR, ch) - disallow errors like ${#+} ? */
5180  || i_peek(input) != '}'
5181  ) {
5182  goto bad_dollar_syntax;
5183  }
5184  /* else: it's "length of C" ${#C} op,
5185  * where C is a single char
5186  * special var name, e.g. ${#!}.
5187  */
5188  }
5189  eat_until_closing:
5190  /* Eat everything until closing '}' (or ':') */
5191  end_ch = '}';
5192  if (BASH_SUBSTR
5193  && ch == ':'
5194  && !strchr(MINUS_PLUS_EQUAL_QUESTION, i_peek(input))
5195  ) {
5196  /* It's ${var:N[:M]} thing */
5197  end_ch = '}' * 0x100 + ':';
5198  }
5199  if (BASH_PATTERN_SUBST
5200  && ch == '/'
5201  ) {
5202  /* It's ${var/[/]pattern[/repl]} thing */
5203  if (i_peek(input) == '/') { /* ${var//pattern[/repl]}? */
5204  i_getch(input);
5205  nommu_addchr(as_string, '/');
5206  ch = '\\';
5207  }
5208  end_ch = '}' * 0x100 + '/';
5209  }
5210  o_addchr(dest, ch);
5211  /* The pattern can't be empty.
5212  * IOW: if the first char after "${v//" is a slash,
5213  * it does not terminate the pattern - it's the first char of the pattern:
5214  * v=/dev/ram; echo ${v////-} prints -dev-ram (pattern is "/")
5215  * v=/dev/ram; echo ${v///r/-} prints /dev-am (pattern is "/r")
5216  */
5217  if (i_peek(input) == '/') {
5218  o_addchr(dest, i_getch(input));
5219  }
5220  again:
5221  if (!BB_MMU)
5222  pos = dest->length;
5223 #if ENABLE_HUSH_DOLLAR_OPS
5224  last_ch = add_till_closing_bracket(dest, input, end_ch);
5225  if (last_ch == 0) /* error? */
5226  return 0;
5227 #else
5228 # error Simple code to only allow ${var} is not implemented
5229 #endif
5230  if (as_string) {
5231  o_addstr(as_string, dest->data + pos);
5232  o_addchr(as_string, last_ch);
5233  }
5234 
5235  if ((BASH_SUBSTR || BASH_PATTERN_SUBST)
5236  && (end_ch & 0xff00)
5237  ) {
5238  /* close the first block: */
5239  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5240  /* while parsing N from ${var:N[:M]}
5241  * or pattern from ${var/[/]pattern[/repl]} */
5242  if ((end_ch & 0xff) == last_ch) {
5243  /* got ':' or '/'- parse the rest */
5244  end_ch = '}';
5245  goto again;
5246  }
5247  /* got '}' */
5248  if (BASH_SUBSTR && end_ch == '}' * 0x100 + ':') {
5249  /* it's ${var:N} - emulate :999999999 */
5250  o_addstr(dest, "999999999");
5251  } /* else: it's ${var/[/]pattern} */
5252  }
5253  break;
5254  }
5255  len_single_ch = 0; /* it can't be ${#C} op */
5256  }
5257  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5258  break;
5259  }
5260 #if ENABLE_FEATURE_SH_MATH || ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
5261  case '(': {
5262  unsigned pos;
5263 
5264  ch = i_getch(input);
5265  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5266 # if ENABLE_FEATURE_SH_MATH
5267  if (i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input) == '(') {
5268  ch = i_getch(input);
5269  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5270  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5271  o_addchr(dest, quote_mask | '+');
5272  if (!BB_MMU)
5273  pos = dest->length;
5274  if (!add_till_closing_bracket(dest, input, ')' | DOUBLE_CLOSE_CHAR_FLAG))
5275  return 0; /* error */
5276  if (as_string) {
5277  o_addstr(as_string, dest->data + pos);
5278  o_addchr(as_string, ')');
5279  o_addchr(as_string, ')');
5280  }
5281  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5282  break;
5283  }
5284 # endif
5285 # if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
5286  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5287  o_addchr(dest, quote_mask | '`');
5288  if (!BB_MMU)
5289  pos = dest->length;
5290  if (!add_till_closing_bracket(dest, input, ')'))
5291  return 0; /* error */
5292  if (as_string) {
5293  o_addstr(as_string, dest->data + pos);
5294  o_addchr(as_string, ')');
5295  }
5296  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5297 # endif
5298  break;
5299  }
5300 #endif
5301  case '_':
5302  goto make_var;
5303 #if 0
5304  /* TODO: $_: */
5305  /* $_ Shell or shell script name; or last argument of last command
5306  * (if last command wasn't a pipe; if it was, bash sets $_ to "");
5307  * but in command's env, set to full pathname used to invoke it */
5308  ch = i_getch(input);
5309  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5310  ch = i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input);
5311  if (isalnum(ch)) { /* it's $_name or $_123 */
5312  ch = '_';
5313  goto make_var1;
5314  }
5315  /* else: it's $_ */
5316 #endif
5317  default:
5318  o_addQchr(dest, '$');
5319  }
5320  debug_printf_parse("parse_dollar return 1 (ok)\n");
5321  return 1;
5322 #undef as_string
5323 }
5324 
5325 #if BB_MMU
5326 #define encode_string(as_string, dest, input, dquote_end) \
5327  encode_string(dest, input, dquote_end)
5328 #define as_string NULL
5329 #endif
5330 static int encode_string(o_string *as_string,
5331  o_string *dest,
5332  struct in_str *input,
5333  int dquote_end)
5334 {
5335  int ch;
5336  int next;
5337 
5338  again:
5339  ch = i_getch(input);
5340  if (ch != EOF)
5341  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5342  if (ch == dquote_end) { /* may be only '"' or EOF */
5343  debug_printf_parse("encode_string return 1 (ok)\n");
5344  return 1;
5345  }
5346  /* note: can't move it above ch == dquote_end check! */
5347  if (ch == EOF) {
5348  syntax_error_unterm_ch('"');
5349  return 0; /* error */
5350  }
5351  next = '\0';
5352  if (ch != '\n') {
5353  next = i_peek(input);
5354  }
5355  debug_printf_parse("\" ch=%c (%d) escape=%d\n",
5356  ch, ch, !!(dest->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS));
5357  if (ch == '\\') {
5358  if (next == EOF) {
5359  /* Testcase: in interactive shell a file with
5360  * echo "unterminated string<eof>
5361  * is sourced.
5362  */
5363  syntax_error_unterm_ch('"');
5364  return 0; /* error */
5365  }
5366  /* bash:
5367  * "The backslash retains its special meaning [in "..."]
5368  * only when followed by one of the following characters:
5369  * $, `, ", \, or <newline>. A double quote may be quoted
5370  * within double quotes by preceding it with a backslash."
5371  * NB: in (unquoted) heredoc, above does not apply to ",
5372  * therefore we check for it by "next == dquote_end" cond.
5373  */
5374  if (next == dquote_end || strchr("$`\\\n", next)) {
5375  ch = i_getch(input); /* eat next */
5376  if (ch == '\n')
5377  goto again; /* skip <newline> */
5378  } /* else: ch remains == '\\', and we double it below: */
5379  o_addqchr(dest, ch); /* \c if c is a glob char, else just c */
5380  nommu_addchr(as_string, ch);
5381  goto again;
5382  }
5383  if (ch == '$') {
5384  //if (parse_dollar_squote(as_string, dest, input))
5385  // goto again;
5386  if (!parse_dollar(as_string, dest, input, /*quote_mask:*/ 0x80)) {
5387  debug_printf_parse("encode_string return 0: "
5388  "parse_dollar returned 0 (error)\n");
5389  return 0;
5390  }
5391  goto again;
5392  }
5393 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
5394  if (ch == '`') {
5395  //unsigned pos = dest->length;
5396  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5397  o_addchr(dest, 0x80 | '`');
5398  if (!add_till_backquote(dest, input, /*in_dquote:*/ dquote_end == '"'))
5399  return 0; /* error */
5400  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5401  //debug_printf_subst("SUBST RES3 '%s'\n", dest->data + pos);
5402  goto again;
5403  }
5404 #endif
5405  o_addQchr(dest, ch);
5406  if (ch == SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL) {
5407  /* Convert "^C" to corresponding special variable reference */
5408  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_QUOTED_SVS);
5409  o_addchr(dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5410  }
5411  goto again;
5412 #undef as_string
5413 }
5414 
5415 /*
5416  * Scan input until EOF or end_trigger char.
5417  * Return a list of pipes to execute, or NULL on EOF
5418  * or if end_trigger character is met.
5419  * On syntax error, exit if shell is not interactive,
5420  * reset parsing machinery and start parsing anew,
5421  * or return ERR_PTR.
5422  */
5423 static struct pipe *parse_stream(char **pstring,
5424  int *heredoc_cnt_ptr,
5425  struct in_str *input,
5426  int end_trigger)
5427 {
5428  struct parse_context ctx;
5429  int heredoc_cnt;
5430 
5431  /* Single-quote triggers a bypass of the main loop until its mate is
5432  * found. When recursing, quote state is passed in via ctx.word.o_expflags.
5433  */
5434  debug_printf_parse("parse_stream entered, end_trigger='%c'\n",
5435  end_trigger ? end_trigger : 'X');
5436  debug_enter();
5437 
5438  initialize_context(&ctx);
5439 
5440  /* If very first arg is "" or '', ctx.word.data may end up NULL.
5441  * Preventing this:
5442  */
5443  ctx.word.data = xzalloc(1); /* start as "", not as NULL */
5444 
5445  /* We used to separate words on $IFS here. This was wrong.
5446  * $IFS is used only for word splitting when $var is expanded,
5447  * here we should use blank chars as separators, not $IFS
5448  */
5449 
5450  heredoc_cnt = 0;
5451  while (1) {
5452  const char *is_blank;
5453  const char *is_special;
5454  int ch;
5455  int next;
5456  int redir_fd;
5457  redir_type redir_style;
5458 
5459  ch = i_getch(input);
5460  debug_printf_parse(": ch=%c (%d) escape=%d\n",
5461  ch, ch, !!(ctx.word.o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS));
5462  if (ch == EOF) {
5463  struct pipe *pi;
5464 
5465  if (heredoc_cnt) {
5466  syntax_error_unterm_str("here document");
5467  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5468  }
5469  if (end_trigger == ')') {
5470  syntax_error_unterm_ch('(');
5471  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5472  }
5473  if (end_trigger == '}') {
5474  syntax_error_unterm_ch('{');
5475  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5476  }
5477 
5478  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5479  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5480  }
5481  o_free_and_set_NULL(&ctx.word);
5482  done_pipe(&ctx, PIPE_SEQ);
5483  pi = ctx.list_head;
5484  /* If we got nothing... */
5485  /* (this makes bare "&" cmd a no-op.
5486  * bash says: "syntax error near unexpected token '&'") */
5487  if (pi->num_cmds == 0
5488  IF_HAS_KEYWORDS(&& pi->res_word == RES_NONE)
5489  ) {
5490  free_pipe_list(pi);
5491  pi = NULL;
5492  }
5493 #if !BB_MMU
5494  debug_printf_parse("as_string1 '%s'\n", ctx.as_string.data);
5495  if (pstring)
5496  *pstring = ctx.as_string.data;
5497  else
5498  o_free(&ctx.as_string);
5499 #endif
5500  // heredoc_cnt must be 0 here anyway
5501  //if (heredoc_cnt_ptr)
5502  // *heredoc_cnt_ptr = heredoc_cnt;
5503  debug_leave();
5504  debug_printf_heredoc("parse_stream return heredoc_cnt:%d\n", heredoc_cnt);
5505  debug_printf_parse("parse_stream return %p\n", pi);
5506  return pi;
5507  }
5508 
5509  /* Handle "'" and "\" first, as they won't play nice with
5510  * i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl() anyway:
5511  * echo z\\
5512  * and
5513  * echo '\
5514  * '
5515  * would break.
5516  */
5517  if (ch == '\\') {
5518  ch = i_getch(input);
5519  if (ch == '\n')
5520  continue; /* drop <newline>, get next char */
5521  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, '\\');
5522  if (ch == SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL) {
5523  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5524  /* Convert \^C to corresponding special variable reference */
5525  goto case_SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL;
5526  }
5527  o_addchr(&ctx.word, '\\');
5528  if (ch == EOF) {
5529  /* Testcase: eval 'echo Ok\' */
5530  /* bash-4.3.43 was removing backslash,
5531  * but 4.4.19 retains it, most other shells too
5532  */
5533  continue; /* get next char */
5534  }
5535  /* Example: echo Hello \2>file
5536  * we need to know that word 2 is quoted
5537  */
5538  ctx.word.has_quoted_part = 1;
5539  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5540  o_addchr(&ctx.word, ch);
5541  continue; /* get next char */
5542  }
5543  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5544  if (ch == '\'') {
5545  ctx.word.has_quoted_part = 1;
5546  next = i_getch(input);
5547  if (next == '\'' && !ctx.pending_redirect)
5548  goto insert_empty_quoted_str_marker;
5549 
5550  ch = next;
5551  while (1) {
5552  if (ch == EOF) {
5553  syntax_error_unterm_ch('\'');
5554  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5555  }
5556  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5557  if (ch == '\'')
5558  break;
5559  if (ch == SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL) {
5560  /* Convert raw ^C to corresponding special variable reference */
5561  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5562  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_QUOTED_SVS);
5563  }
5564  o_addqchr(&ctx.word, ch);
5565  ch = i_getch(input);
5566  }
5567  continue; /* get next char */
5568  }
5569 
5570  next = '\0';
5571  if (ch != '\n')
5572  next = i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input);
5573 
5574  is_special = "{}<>&|();#" /* special outside of "str" */
5575  "$\"" IF_HUSH_TICK("`") /* always special */
5576  SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL_STR;
5577 #if defined(CMD_TEST2_SINGLEWORD_NOGLOB)
5578  if (ctx.command->cmd_type == CMD_TEST2_SINGLEWORD_NOGLOB) {
5579  /* In [[ ]], {}<>&|() are not special */
5580  is_special += 8;
5581  } else
5582 #endif
5583  /* Are { and } special here? */
5584  if (ctx.command->argv /* word [word]{... - non-special */
5585  || ctx.word.length /* word{... - non-special */
5586  || ctx.word.has_quoted_part /* ""{... - non-special */
5587  || (next != ';' /* }; - special */
5588  && next != ')' /* }) - special */
5589  && next != '(' /* {( - special */
5590  && next != '&' /* }& and }&& ... - special */
5591  && next != '|' /* }|| ... - special */
5592  && !strchr(defifs, next) /* {word - non-special */
5593  )
5594  ) {
5595  /* They are not special, skip "{}" */
5596  is_special += 2;
5597  }
5598  is_special = strchr(is_special, ch);
5599  is_blank = strchr(defifs, ch);
5600 
5601  if (!is_special && !is_blank) { /* ordinary char */
5602  ordinary_char:
5603  o_addQchr(&ctx.word, ch);
5604  if ((ctx.is_assignment == MAYBE_ASSIGNMENT
5605  || ctx.is_assignment == WORD_IS_KEYWORD)
5606  && ch == '='
5607  && endofname(ctx.word.data)[0] == '='
5608  ) {
5609  ctx.is_assignment = DEFINITELY_ASSIGNMENT;
5610  debug_printf_parse("ctx.is_assignment='%s'\n", assignment_flag[ctx.is_assignment]);
5611  }
5612  continue;
5613  }
5614 
5615  if (is_blank) {
5616 #if ENABLE_HUSH_LINENO_VAR
5617 /* Case:
5618  * "while ...; do<whitespace><newline>
5619  * cmd ..."
5620  * would think that "cmd" starts in <whitespace> -
5621  * i.e., at the previous line.
5622  * We need to skip all whitespace before newlines.
5623  */
5624  while (ch != '\n') {
5625  next = i_peek(input);
5626  if (next != ' ' && next != '\t' && next != '\n')
5627  break; /* next char is not ws */
5628  ch = i_getch(input);
5629  }
5630  /* ch == last eaten whitespace char */
5631 #endif
5632  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5633  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5634  }
5635  if (ch == '\n') {
5636  /* Is this a case when newline is simply ignored?
5637  * Some examples:
5638  * "cmd | <newline> cmd ..."
5639  * "case ... in <newline> word) ..."
5640  */
5641  if (IS_NULL_CMD(ctx.command)
5642  && ctx.word.length == 0
5643  && !ctx.word.has_quoted_part
5644  && heredoc_cnt == 0
5645  ) {
5646  /* This newline can be ignored. But...
5647  * Without check #1, interactive shell
5648  * ignores even bare <newline>,
5649  * and shows the continuation prompt:
5650  * ps1_prompt$ <enter>
5651  * ps2> _ <=== wrong, should be ps1
5652  * Without check #2, "cmd & <newline>"
5653  * is similarly mistreated.
5654  * (BTW, this makes "cmd & cmd"
5655  * and "cmd && cmd" non-orthogonal.
5656  * Really, ask yourself, why
5657  * "cmd && <newline>" doesn't start
5658  * cmd but waits for more input?
5659  * The only reason is that it might be
5660  * a "cmd1 && <nl> cmd2 &" construct,
5661  * cmd1 may need to run in BG).
5662  */
5663  struct pipe *pi = ctx.list_head;
5664  if (pi->num_cmds != 0 /* check #1 */
5665  && pi->followup != PIPE_BG /* check #2 */
5666  ) {
5667  continue;
5668  }
5669  }
5670  /* Treat newline as a command separator. */
5671  done_pipe(&ctx, PIPE_SEQ);
5672  debug_printf_heredoc("heredoc_cnt:%d\n", heredoc_cnt);
5673  if (heredoc_cnt) {
5674  heredoc_cnt = fetch_heredocs(&ctx.as_string, ctx.list_head, heredoc_cnt, input);
5675  if (heredoc_cnt != 0)
5676  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5677  }
5678  ctx.is_assignment = MAYBE_ASSIGNMENT;
5679  debug_printf_parse("ctx.is_assignment='%s'\n", assignment_flag[ctx.is_assignment]);
5680  ch = ';';
5681  /* note: if (is_blank) continue;
5682  * will still trigger for us */
5683  }
5684  }
5685 
5686  /* "cmd}" or "cmd }..." without semicolon or &:
5687  * } is an ordinary char in this case, even inside { cmd; }
5688  * Pathological example: { ""}; } should exec "}" cmd
5689  */
5690  if (ch == '}') {
5691  if (ctx.word.length != 0 /* word} */
5692  || ctx.word.has_quoted_part /* ""} */
5693  ) {
5694  goto ordinary_char;
5695  }
5696  if (!IS_NULL_CMD(ctx.command)) { /* cmd } */
5697  /* Generally, there should be semicolon: "cmd; }"
5698  * However, bash allows to omit it if "cmd" is
5699  * a group. Examples:
5700  * { { echo 1; } }
5701  * {(echo 1)}
5702  * { echo 0 >&2 | { echo 1; } }
5703  * { while false; do :; done }
5704  * { case a in b) ;; esac }
5705  */
5706  if (ctx.command->group)
5707  goto term_group;
5708  goto ordinary_char;
5709  }
5710  if (!IS_NULL_PIPE(ctx.pipe)) /* cmd | } */
5711  /* Can't be an end of {cmd}, skip the check */
5712  goto skip_end_trigger;
5713  /* else: } does terminate a group */
5714  }
5715  term_group:
5716  if (end_trigger && end_trigger == ch
5717  && (ch != ';' || heredoc_cnt == 0)
5718 #if ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
5719  && (ch != ')'
5720  || ctx.ctx_res_w != RES_MATCH
5721  || (!ctx.word.has_quoted_part && strcmp(ctx.word.data, "esac") == 0)
5722  )
5723 #endif
5724  ) {
5725  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5726  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5727  }
5728  done_pipe(&ctx, PIPE_SEQ);
5729  ctx.is_assignment = MAYBE_ASSIGNMENT;
5730  debug_printf_parse("ctx.is_assignment='%s'\n", assignment_flag[ctx.is_assignment]);
5731  /* Do we sit outside of any if's, loops or case's? */
5732  if (!HAS_KEYWORDS
5733  IF_HAS_KEYWORDS(|| (ctx.ctx_res_w == RES_NONE && ctx.old_flag == 0))
5734  ) {
5735  o_free_and_set_NULL(&ctx.word);
5736 #if !BB_MMU
5737  debug_printf_parse("as_string2 '%s'\n", ctx.as_string.data);
5738  if (pstring)
5739  *pstring = ctx.as_string.data;
5740  else
5741  o_free(&ctx.as_string);
5742 #endif
5743  if (ch != ';' && IS_NULL_PIPE(ctx.list_head)) {
5744  /* Example: bare "{ }", "()" */
5745  G.last_exitcode = 2; /* bash compat */
5746  syntax_error_unexpected_ch(ch);
5747  goto parse_error;
5748  }
5749  if (heredoc_cnt_ptr)
5750  *heredoc_cnt_ptr = heredoc_cnt;
5751  debug_printf_heredoc("parse_stream return heredoc_cnt:%d\n", heredoc_cnt);
5752  debug_printf_parse("parse_stream return %p: "
5753  "end_trigger char found\n",
5754  ctx.list_head);
5755  debug_leave();
5756  return ctx.list_head;
5757  }
5758  }
5759 
5760  if (is_blank)
5761  continue;
5762 
5763  /* Catch <, > before deciding whether this word is
5764  * an assignment. a=1 2>z b=2: b=2 is still assignment */
5765  switch (ch) {
5766  case '>':
5767  redir_fd = redirect_opt_num(&ctx.word);
5768  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5769  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5770  }
5771  redir_style = REDIRECT_OVERWRITE;
5772  if (next == '>') {
5773  redir_style = REDIRECT_APPEND;
5774  ch = i_getch(input);
5775  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5776  }
5777 #if 0
5778  else if (next == '(') {
5779  syntax_error(">(process) not supported");
5780  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5781  }
5782 #endif
5783  if (parse_redirect(&ctx, redir_fd, redir_style, input))
5784  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5785  continue; /* get next char */
5786  case '<':
5787  redir_fd = redirect_opt_num(&ctx.word);
5788  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5789  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5790  }
5791  redir_style = REDIRECT_INPUT;
5792  if (next == '<') {
5793  redir_style = REDIRECT_HEREDOC;
5794  heredoc_cnt++;
5795  debug_printf_heredoc("++heredoc_cnt=%d\n", heredoc_cnt);
5796  ch = i_getch(input);
5797  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5798  } else if (next == '>') {
5799  redir_style = REDIRECT_IO;
5800  ch = i_getch(input);
5801  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5802  }
5803 #if 0
5804  else if (next == '(') {
5805  syntax_error("<(process) not supported");
5806  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5807  }
5808 #endif
5809  if (parse_redirect(&ctx, redir_fd, redir_style, input))
5810  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5811  continue; /* get next char */
5812  case '#':
5813  if (ctx.word.length == 0 && !ctx.word.has_quoted_part) {
5814  /* skip "#comment" */
5815  /* note: we do not add it to &ctx.as_string */
5816 /* TODO: in bash:
5817  * comment inside $() goes to the next \n, even inside quoted string (!):
5818  * cmd "$(cmd2 #comment)" - syntax error
5819  * cmd "`cmd2 #comment`" - ok
5820  * We accept both (comment ends where command subst ends, in both cases).
5821  */
5822  while (1) {
5823  ch = i_peek(input);
5824  if (ch == '\n') {
5825  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, '\n');
5826  break;
5827  }
5828  ch = i_getch(input);
5829  if (ch == EOF)
5830  break;
5831  }
5832  continue; /* get next char */
5833  }
5834  break;
5835  }
5836  skip_end_trigger:
5837 
5838  if (ctx.is_assignment == MAYBE_ASSIGNMENT
5839  /* check that we are not in word in "a=1 2>word b=1": */
5840  && !ctx.pending_redirect
5841  ) {
5842  /* ch is a special char and thus this word
5843  * cannot be an assignment */
5844  ctx.is_assignment = NOT_ASSIGNMENT;
5845  debug_printf_parse("ctx.is_assignment='%s'\n", assignment_flag[ctx.is_assignment]);
5846  }
5847 
5848  /* Note: nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch) is already done */
5849 
5850  switch (ch) {
5851  case_SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL:
5852  case SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL:
5853  /* Convert raw ^C to corresponding special variable reference */
5854  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5855  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_QUOTED_SVS);
5856  /* fall through */
5857  case '#':
5858  /* non-comment #: "echo a#b" etc */
5859  o_addchr(&ctx.word, ch);
5860  continue; /* get next char */
5861  case '$':
5862  if (parse_dollar_squote(&ctx.as_string, &ctx.word, input))
5863  continue; /* get next char */
5864  if (!parse_dollar(&ctx.as_string, &ctx.word, input, /*quote_mask:*/ 0)) {
5865  debug_printf_parse("parse_stream parse error: "
5866  "parse_dollar returned 0 (error)\n");
5867  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5868  }
5869  continue; /* get next char */
5870  case '"':
5871  ctx.word.has_quoted_part = 1;
5872  if (next == '"' && !ctx.pending_redirect) {
5873  i_getch(input); /* eat second " */
5874  insert_empty_quoted_str_marker:
5875  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, next);
5876  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5877  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5878  continue; /* get next char */
5879  }
5880  if (ctx.is_assignment == NOT_ASSIGNMENT)
5881  ctx.word.o_expflags |= EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS;
5882  if (!encode_string(&ctx.as_string, &ctx.word, input, '"'))
5883  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5884  ctx.word.o_expflags &= ~EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS;
5885  continue; /* get next char */
5886 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
5887  case '`': {
5888  USE_FOR_NOMMU(unsigned pos;)
5889 
5890  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5891  o_addchr(&ctx.word, '`');
5892  USE_FOR_NOMMU(pos = ctx.word.length;)
5893  if (!add_till_backquote(&ctx.word, input, /*in_dquote:*/ 0))
5894  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5895 # if !BB_MMU
5896  o_addstr(&ctx.as_string, ctx.word.data + pos);
5897  o_addchr(&ctx.as_string, '`');
5898 # endif
5899  o_addchr(&ctx.word, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
5900  //debug_printf_subst("SUBST RES3 '%s'\n", ctx.word.data + pos);
5901  continue; /* get next char */
5902  }
5903 #endif
5904  case ';':
5905 #if ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
5906  case_semi:
5907 #endif
5908  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5909  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5910  }
5911  done_pipe(&ctx, PIPE_SEQ);
5912 #if ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
5913  /* Eat multiple semicolons, detect
5914  * whether it means something special */
5915  while (1) {
5916  ch = i_peek_and_eat_bkslash_nl(input);
5917  if (ch != ';')
5918  break;
5919  ch = i_getch(input);
5920  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5921  if (ctx.ctx_res_w == RES_CASE_BODY) {
5922  ctx.ctx_dsemicolon = 1;
5923  ctx.ctx_res_w = RES_MATCH;
5924  break;
5925  }
5926  }
5927 #endif
5928  new_cmd:
5929  /* We just finished a cmd. New one may start
5930  * with an assignment */
5931  ctx.is_assignment = MAYBE_ASSIGNMENT;
5932  debug_printf_parse("ctx.is_assignment='%s'\n", assignment_flag[ctx.is_assignment]);
5933  continue; /* get next char */
5934  case '&':
5935  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5936  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5937  }
5938  if (next == '&') {
5939  ch = i_getch(input);
5940  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5941  done_pipe(&ctx, PIPE_AND);
5942  } else {
5943  done_pipe(&ctx, PIPE_BG);
5944  }
5945  goto new_cmd;
5946  case '|':
5947  if (done_word(&ctx)) {
5948  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5949  }
5950 #if ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
5951  if (ctx.ctx_res_w == RES_MATCH)
5952  break; /* we are in case's "word | word)" */
5953 #endif
5954  if (next == '|') { /* || */
5955  ch = i_getch(input);
5956  nommu_addchr(&ctx.as_string, ch);
5957  done_pipe(&ctx, PIPE_OR);
5958  } else {
5959  /* we could pick up a file descriptor choice here
5960  * with redirect_opt_num(), but bash doesn't do it.
5961  * "echo foo 2| cat" yields "foo 2". */
5962  done_command(&ctx);
5963  }
5964  goto new_cmd;
5965  case '(':
5966 #if ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
5967  /* "case... in [(]word)..." - skip '(' */
5968  if (ctx.ctx_res_w == RES_MATCH
5969  && ctx.command->argv == NULL /* not (word|(... */
5970  && ctx.word.length == 0 /* not word(... */
5971  && ctx.word.has_quoted_part == 0 /* not ""(... */
5972  ) {
5973  continue; /* get next char */
5974  }
5975 #endif
5976  /* fall through */
5977  case '{': {
5978  int n = parse_group(&ctx, input, ch);
5979  if (n < 0) {
5980  goto parse_error_exitcode1;
5981  }
5982  debug_printf_heredoc("parse_group done, needs heredocs:%d\n", n);
5983  heredoc_cnt += n;
5984  goto new_cmd;
5985  }
5986  case ')':
5987 #if ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
5988  if (ctx.ctx_res_w == RES_MATCH)
5989  goto case_semi;
5990 #endif
5991  case '}':
5992  /* proper use of this character is caught by end_trigger:
5993  * if we see {, we call parse_group(..., end_trigger='}')
5994  * and it will match } earlier (not here). */
5995  G.last_exitcode = 2;
5996  syntax_error_unexpected_ch(ch);
5997  goto parse_error;
5998  default:
5999  if (HUSH_DEBUG)
6000  bb_error_msg_and_die("BUG: unexpected %c", ch);
6001  }
6002  } /* while (1) */
6003 
6004  parse_error_exitcode1:
6005  G.last_exitcode = 1;
6006  parse_error:
6007  {
6008  struct parse_context *pctx;
6009  IF_HAS_KEYWORDS(struct parse_context *p2;)
6010 
6011  /* Clean up allocated tree.
6012  * Sample for finding leaks on syntax error recovery path.
6013  * Run it from interactive shell, watch pmap `pidof hush`.
6014  * while if false; then false; fi; do break; fi
6015  * Samples to catch leaks at execution:
6016  * while if (true | { true;}); then echo ok; fi; do break; done
6017  * while if (true | { true;}); then echo ok; fi; do (if echo ok; break; then :; fi) | cat; break; done
6018  */
6019  pctx = &ctx;
6020  do {
6021  /* Update pipe/command counts,
6022  * otherwise freeing may miss some */
6023  done_pipe(pctx, PIPE_SEQ);
6024  debug_printf_clean("freeing list %p from ctx %p\n",
6025  pctx->list_head, pctx);
6026  debug_print_tree(pctx->list_head, 0);
6027  free_pipe_list(pctx->list_head);
6028  debug_printf_clean("freed list %p\n", pctx->list_head);
6029 #if !BB_MMU
6030  o_free(&pctx->as_string);
6031 #endif
6032  IF_HAS_KEYWORDS(p2 = pctx->stack;)
6033  if (pctx != &ctx) {
6034  free(pctx);
6035  }
6036  IF_HAS_KEYWORDS(pctx = p2;)
6037  } while (HAS_KEYWORDS && pctx);
6038 
6039  o_free(&ctx.word);
6040 #if !BB_MMU
6041  if (pstring)
6042  *pstring = NULL;
6043 #endif
6044  debug_leave();
6045  return ERR_PTR;
6046  }
6047 }
6048 
6049 
6050 /*** Execution routines ***/
6051 
6052 /* Expansion can recurse, need forward decls: */
6053 #if !BASH_PATTERN_SUBST && !ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
6054 #define expand_string_to_string(str, EXP_flags, do_unbackslash) \
6055  expand_string_to_string(str)
6056 #endif
6057 static char *expand_string_to_string(const char *str, int EXP_flags, int do_unbackslash);
6058 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
6059 static int process_command_subs(o_string *dest, const char *s);
6060 #endif
6061 static int expand_vars_to_list(o_string *output, int n, char *arg);
6062 
6063 /* expand_strvec_to_strvec() takes a list of strings, expands
6064  * all variable references within and returns a pointer to
6065  * a list of expanded strings, possibly with larger number
6066  * of strings. (Think VAR="a b"; echo $VAR).
6067  * This new list is allocated as a single malloc block.
6068  * NULL-terminated list of char* pointers is at the beginning of it,
6069  * followed by strings themselves.
6070  * Caller can deallocate entire list by single free(list). */
6071 
6072 /* A horde of its helpers come first: */
6073 
6074 static void o_addblock_duplicate_backslash(o_string *o, const char *str, int len)
6075 {
6076  while (--len >= 0) {
6077  char c = *str++;
6078 
6079 #if ENABLE_HUSH_BRACE_EXPANSION
6080  if (c == '{' || c == '}') {
6081  /* { -> \{, } -> \} */
6082  o_addchr(o, '\\');
6083  /* And now we want to add { or } and continue:
6084  * o_addchr(o, c);
6085  * continue;
6086  * luckily, just falling through achieves this.
6087  */
6088  }
6089 #endif
6090  o_addchr(o, c);
6091  if (c == '\\') {
6092  /* \z -> \\\z; <eol> -> \<eol> */
6093  o_addchr(o, '\\');
6094  if (len) {
6095  len--;
6096  o_addchr(o, '\\');
6097  o_addchr(o, *str++);
6098  }
6099  }
6100  }
6101 }
6102 
6103 /* Store given string, finalizing the word and starting new one whenever
6104  * we encounter IFS char(s). This is used for expanding variable values.
6105  * End-of-string does NOT finalize word: think about 'echo -$VAR-'.
6106  * Return in output->ended_in_ifs:
6107  * 1 - ended with IFS char, else 0 (this includes case of empty str).
6108  */
6109 static int expand_on_ifs(o_string *output, int n, const char *str)
6110 {
6111  int last_is_ifs = 0;
6112 
6113  while (1) {
6114  int word_len;
6115 
6116  if (!*str) /* EOL - do not finalize word */
6117  break;
6118  word_len = strcspn(str, G.ifs);
6119  if (word_len) {
6120  /* We have WORD_LEN leading non-IFS chars */
6121  if (!(output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_GLOB)) {
6122  o_addblock(output, str, word_len);
6123  } else {
6124  /* Protect backslashes against globbing up :)
6125  * Example: "v='\*'; echo b$v" prints "b\*"
6126  * (and does not try to glob on "*")
6127  */
6128  o_addblock_duplicate_backslash(output, str, word_len);
6129  /*/ Why can't we do it easier? */
6130  /*o_addblock(output, str, word_len); - WRONG: "v='\*'; echo Z$v" prints "Z*" instead of "Z\*" */
6131  /*o_addqblock(output, str, word_len); - WRONG: "v='*'; echo Z$v" prints "Z*" instead of Z* files */
6132  }
6133  last_is_ifs = 0;
6134  str += word_len;
6135  if (!*str) /* EOL - do not finalize word */
6136  break;
6137  }
6138 
6139  /* We know str here points to at least one IFS char */
6140  last_is_ifs = 1;
6141  str += strspn(str, G.ifs_whitespace); /* skip IFS whitespace chars */
6142  if (!*str) /* EOL - do not finalize word */
6143  break;
6144 
6145  if (G.ifs_whitespace != G.ifs /* usually false ($IFS is usually all whitespace), */
6146  && strchr(G.ifs, *str) /* the second check would fail */
6147  ) {
6148  /* This is a non-whitespace $IFS char */
6149  /* Skip it and IFS whitespace chars, start new word */
6150  str++;
6151  str += strspn(str, G.ifs_whitespace);
6152  goto new_word;
6153  }
6154 
6155  /* Start new word... but not always! */
6156  /* Case "v=' a'; echo ''$v": we do need to finalize empty word: */
6157  if (output->has_quoted_part
6158  /*
6159  * Case "v=' a'; echo $v":
6160  * here nothing precedes the space in $v expansion,
6161  * therefore we should not finish the word
6162  * (IOW: if there *is* word to finalize, only then do it):
6163  * It's okay if this accesses the byte before first argv[]:
6164  * past call to o_save_ptr() cleared it to zero byte
6165  * (grep for -prev-ifs-check-).
6166  */
6167  || output->data[output->length - 1]
6168  ) {
6169  new_word:
6170  o_addchr(output, '\0');
6171  debug_print_list("expand_on_ifs", output, n);
6172  n = o_save_ptr(output, n);
6173  }
6174  }
6175 
6176  output->ended_in_ifs = last_is_ifs;
6177  debug_print_list("expand_on_ifs[1]", output, n);
6178  return n;
6179 }
6180 
6181 /* Helper to expand $((...)) and heredoc body. These act as if
6182  * they are in double quotes, with the exception that they are not :).
6183  * Just the rules are similar: "expand only $var and `cmd`"
6184  *
6185  * Returns malloced string.
6186  * As an optimization, we return NULL if expansion is not needed.
6187  */
6188 static char *encode_then_expand_string(const char *str)
6189 {
6190  char *exp_str;
6191  struct in_str input;
6192  o_string dest = NULL_O_STRING;
6193  const char *cp;
6194 
6195  cp = str;
6196  for (;;) {
6197  if (!*cp) return NULL; /* string has no special chars */
6198  if (*cp == '$') break;
6199  if (*cp == '\\') break;
6200 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
6201  if (*cp == '`') break;
6202 #endif
6203  cp++;
6204  }
6205 
6206  /* We need to expand. Example:
6207  * echo $(($a + `echo 1`)) $((1 + $((2)) ))
6208  */
6209  setup_string_in_str(&input, str);
6210  encode_string(NULL, &dest, &input, EOF);
6211 //TODO: error check (encode_string returns 0 on error)?
6212  //bb_error_msg("'%s' -> '%s'", str, dest.data);
6213  exp_str = expand_string_to_string(dest.data,
6214  EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS,
6215  /*unbackslash:*/ 1
6216  );
6217  //bb_error_msg("'%s' -> '%s'", dest.data, exp_str);
6218  o_free(&dest);
6219  return exp_str;
6220 }
6221 
6222 static const char *first_special_char_in_vararg(const char *cp)
6223 {
6224  for (;;) {
6225  if (!*cp) return NULL; /* string has no special chars */
6226  if (*cp == '$') return cp;
6227  if (*cp == '\\') return cp;
6228  if (*cp == '\'') return cp;
6229  if (*cp == '"') return cp;
6230 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
6231  if (*cp == '`') return cp;
6232 #endif
6233  /* dquoted "${x:+ARG}" should not glob, therefore
6234  * '*' et al require some non-literal processing: */
6235  if (*cp == '*') return cp;
6236  if (*cp == '?') return cp;
6237  if (*cp == '[') return cp;
6238  cp++;
6239  }
6240 }
6241 
6242 /* Expanding ARG in ${var#ARG}, ${var%ARG}, or ${var/ARG/ARG}.
6243  * These can contain single- and double-quoted strings,
6244  * and treated as if the ARG string is initially unquoted. IOW:
6245  * ${var#ARG} and "${var#ARG}" treat ARG the same (ARG can even be
6246  * a dquoted string: "${var#"zz"}"), the difference only comes later
6247  * (word splitting and globbing of the ${var...} result).
6248  */
6249 #if !BASH_PATTERN_SUBST
6250 #define encode_then_expand_vararg(str, handle_squotes, do_unbackslash) \
6251  encode_then_expand_vararg(str, handle_squotes)
6252 #endif
6253 static char *encode_then_expand_vararg(const char *str, int handle_squotes, int do_unbackslash)
6254 {
6255 #if !BASH_PATTERN_SUBST && ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
6256  const int do_unbackslash = 0;
6257 #endif
6258  char *exp_str;
6259  struct in_str input;
6260  o_string dest = NULL_O_STRING;
6261 
6262  if (!first_special_char_in_vararg(str)) {
6263  /* string has no special chars */
6264  return NULL;
6265  }
6266 
6267  setup_string_in_str(&input, str);
6268  dest.data = xzalloc(1); /* start as "", not as NULL */
6269  exp_str = NULL;
6270 
6271  for (;;) {
6272  int ch;
6273 
6274  ch = i_getch(&input);
6275  debug_printf_parse("%s: ch=%c (%d) escape=%d\n",
6276  __func__, ch, ch, !!dest.o_expflags);
6277 
6278  if (!dest.o_expflags) {
6279  if (ch == EOF)
6280  break;
6281  if (handle_squotes && ch == '\'') {
6282  if (!add_till_single_quote_dquoted(&dest, &input))
6283  goto ret; /* error */
6284  continue;
6285  }
6286  }
6287  if (ch == EOF) {
6288  syntax_error_unterm_ch('"');
6289  goto ret; /* error */
6290  }
6291  if (ch == '"') {
6292  dest.o_expflags ^= EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS;
6293  continue;
6294  }
6295  if (ch == '\\') {
6296  ch = i_getch(&input);
6297  if (ch == EOF) {
6298 //example? error message? syntax_error_unterm_ch('"');
6299  debug_printf_parse("%s: error: \\<eof>\n", __func__);
6300  goto ret;
6301  }
6302  o_addqchr(&dest, ch);
6303  continue;
6304  }
6305  if (ch == '$') {
6306  if (parse_dollar_squote(NULL, &dest, &input))
6307  continue;
6308  if (!parse_dollar(NULL, &dest, &input, /*quote_mask:*/ 0x80)) {
6309  debug_printf_parse("%s: error: parse_dollar returned 0 (error)\n", __func__);
6310  goto ret;
6311  }
6312  continue;
6313  }
6314 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
6315  if (ch == '`') {
6316  //unsigned pos = dest->length;
6317  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6318  o_addchr(&dest, 0x80 | '`');
6319  if (!add_till_backquote(&dest, &input,
6320  /*in_dquote:*/ dest.o_expflags /* nonzero if EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS set */
6321  )
6322  ) {
6323  goto ret; /* error */
6324  }
6325  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6326  //debug_printf_subst("SUBST RES3 '%s'\n", dest->data + pos);
6327  continue;
6328  }
6329 #endif
6330  o_addQchr(&dest, ch);
6331  } /* for (;;) */
6332 
6333  debug_printf_parse("encode: '%s' -> '%s'\n", str, dest.data);
6334  exp_str = expand_string_to_string(dest.data,
6335  do_unbackslash ? EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS : 0,
6336  do_unbackslash
6337  );
6338  ret:
6339  debug_printf_parse("expand: '%s' -> '%s'\n", dest.data, exp_str);
6340  o_free(&dest);
6341  return exp_str;
6342 }
6343 
6344 /* Expanding ARG in ${var+ARG}, ${var-ARG}
6345  */
6346 static NOINLINE int encode_then_append_var_plusminus(o_string *output, int n,
6347  char *str, int dquoted)
6348 {
6349  struct in_str input;
6350  o_string dest = NULL_O_STRING;
6351 
6352  if (!first_special_char_in_vararg(str)
6353  && '\0' == str[strcspn(str, G.ifs)]
6354  ) {
6355  /* string has no special chars
6356  * && string has no $IFS chars
6357  */
6358  if (dquoted) {
6359  /* Prints 1 (quoted expansion is a "" word, not nothing):
6360  * set -- "${notexist-}"; echo $#
6361  */
6362  output->has_quoted_part = 1;
6363  }
6364  return expand_vars_to_list(output, n, str);
6365  }
6366 
6367  setup_string_in_str(&input, str);
6368 
6369  for (;;) {
6370  int ch;
6371 
6372  ch = i_getch(&input);
6373  debug_printf_parse("%s: ch=%c (%d) escape=%x\n",
6374  __func__, ch, ch, dest.o_expflags);
6375 
6376  if (!dest.o_expflags) {
6377  if (ch == EOF)
6378  break;
6379  if (!dquoted && strchr(G.ifs, ch)) {
6380  /* PREFIX${x:d${e}f ...} and we met space: expand "d${e}f" and start new word.
6381  * do not assume we are at the start of the word (PREFIX above).
6382  */
6383  if (dest.data) {
6384  n = expand_vars_to_list(output, n, dest.data);
6385  o_free_and_set_NULL(&dest);
6386  o_addchr(output, '\0');
6387  n = o_save_ptr(output, n); /* create next word */
6388  } else
6389  if (output->length != o_get_last_ptr(output, n)
6390  || output->has_quoted_part
6391  ) {
6392  /* For these cases:
6393  * f() { for i; do echo "|$i|"; done; }; x=x
6394  * f a${x:+ }b # 1st condition
6395  * |a|
6396  * |b|
6397  * f ""${x:+ }b # 2nd condition
6398  * ||
6399  * |b|
6400  */
6401  o_addchr(output, '\0');
6402  n = o_save_ptr(output, n); /* create next word */
6403  }
6404  continue;
6405  }
6406  if (!dquoted && ch == '\'') {
6407  if (!add_till_single_quote_dquoted(&dest, &input))
6408  goto ret; /* error */
6409  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6410  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6411  continue;
6412  }
6413  }
6414  if (ch == EOF) {
6415  syntax_error_unterm_ch('"');
6416  goto ret; /* error */
6417  }
6418  if (ch == '"') {
6419  dest.o_expflags ^= EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS;
6420  if (dest.o_expflags) {
6421  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6422  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6423  }
6424  continue;
6425  }
6426  if (ch == '\\') {
6427  ch = i_getch(&input);
6428  if (ch == EOF) {
6429 //example? error message? syntax_error_unterm_ch('"');
6430  debug_printf_parse("%s: error: \\<eof>\n", __func__);
6431  goto ret;
6432  }
6433  o_addqchr(&dest, ch);
6434  continue;
6435  }
6436  if (ch == '$') {
6437  if (!parse_dollar(NULL, &dest, &input, /*quote_mask:*/ (dest.o_expflags || dquoted) ? 0x80 : 0)) {
6438  debug_printf_parse("%s: error: parse_dollar returned 0 (error)\n", __func__);
6439  goto ret;
6440  }
6441  continue;
6442  }
6443 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
6444  if (ch == '`') {
6445  //unsigned pos = dest->length;
6446  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6447  o_addchr(&dest, (dest.o_expflags || dquoted) ? 0x80 | '`' : '`');
6448  if (!add_till_backquote(&dest, &input,
6449  /*in_dquote:*/ dest.o_expflags /* nonzero if EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS set */
6450  )
6451  ) {
6452  goto ret; /* error */
6453  }
6454  o_addchr(&dest, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6455  //debug_printf_subst("SUBST RES3 '%s'\n", dest->data + pos);
6456  continue;
6457  }
6458 #endif
6459  if (dquoted) {
6460  /* Always glob-protect if in dquotes:
6461  * x=x; echo "${x:+/bin/c*}" - prints: /bin/c*
6462  * x=x; echo "${x:+"/bin/c*"}" - prints: /bin/c*
6463  */
6464  o_addqchr(&dest, ch);
6465  } else {
6466  /* Glob-protect only if char is quoted:
6467  * x=x; echo ${x:+/bin/c*} - prints many filenames
6468  * x=x; echo ${x:+"/bin/c*"} - prints: /bin/c*
6469  */
6470  o_addQchr(&dest, ch);
6471  }
6472  } /* for (;;) */
6473 
6474  if (dest.data) {
6475  n = expand_vars_to_list(output, n, dest.data);
6476  }
6477  ret:
6478  o_free(&dest);
6479  return n;
6480 }
6481 
6482 #if ENABLE_FEATURE_SH_MATH
6483 static arith_t expand_and_evaluate_arith(const char *arg, const char **errmsg_p)
6484 {
6485  arith_state_t math_state;
6486  arith_t res;
6487  char *exp_str;
6488 
6489  math_state.lookupvar = get_local_var_value;
6490  math_state.setvar = set_local_var_from_halves;
6491  //math_state.endofname = endofname;
6492  exp_str = encode_then_expand_string(arg);
6493  res = arith(&math_state, exp_str ? exp_str : arg);
6494  free(exp_str);
6495  if (errmsg_p)
6496  *errmsg_p = math_state.errmsg;
6497  if (math_state.errmsg)
6498  msg_and_die_if_script(math_state.errmsg);
6499  return res;
6500 }
6501 #endif
6502 
6503 #if BASH_PATTERN_SUBST
6504 /* ${var/[/]pattern[/repl]} helpers */
6505 static char *strstr_pattern(char *val, const char *pattern, int *size)
6506 {
6507  int first_escaped = (pattern[0] == '\\' && pattern[1]);
6508  /* "first_escaped" trick allows to treat e.g. "\*no_glob_chars"
6509  * as literal too (as it is semi-common, and easy to accomodate
6510  * by just using str + 1).
6511  */
6512  int sz = strcspn(pattern + first_escaped * 2, "*?[\\");
6513  if ((pattern + first_escaped * 2)[sz] == '\0') {
6514  /* Optimization for trivial patterns.
6515  * Testcase for very slow replace (performs about 22k replaces):
6516  * x=::::::::::::::::::::::
6517  * x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;x=$x$x;echo ${#x}
6518  * echo "${x//:/|}"
6519  */
6520  *size = sz + first_escaped;
6521  return strstr(val, pattern + first_escaped);
6522  }
6523 
6524  while (1) {
6525  char *end = scan_and_match(val, pattern, SCAN_MOVE_FROM_RIGHT + SCAN_MATCH_LEFT_HALF);
6526  debug_printf_varexp("val:'%s' pattern:'%s' end:'%s'\n", val, pattern, end);
6527  if (end) {
6528  *size = end - val;
6529  return val;
6530  }
6531  if (*val == '\0')
6532  return NULL;
6533  /* Optimization: if "*pat" did not match the start of "string",
6534  * we know that "tring", "ring" etc will not match too:
6535  */
6536  if (pattern[0] == '*')
6537  return NULL;
6538  val++;
6539  }
6540 }
6541 static char *replace_pattern(char *val, const char *pattern, const char *repl, char exp_op)
6542 {
6543  char *result = NULL;
6544  unsigned res_len = 0;
6545  unsigned repl_len = strlen(repl);
6546 
6547  /* Null pattern never matches, including if "var" is empty */
6548  if (!pattern[0])
6549  return result; /* NULL, no replaces happened */
6550 
6551  while (1) {
6552  int size;
6553  char *s = strstr_pattern(val, pattern, &size);
6554  if (!s)
6555  break;
6556 
6557  result = xrealloc(result, res_len + (s - val) + repl_len + 1);
6558  strcpy(mempcpy(result + res_len, val, s - val), repl);
6559  res_len += (s - val) + repl_len;
6560  debug_printf_varexp("val:'%s' s:'%s' result:'%s'\n", val, s, result);
6561 
6562  val = s + size;
6563  if (exp_op == '/')
6564  break;
6565  }
6566  if (*val && result) {
6567  result = xrealloc(result, res_len + strlen(val) + 1);
6568  strcpy(result + res_len, val);
6569  debug_printf_varexp("val:'%s' result:'%s'\n", val, result);
6570  }
6571  debug_printf_varexp("result:'%s'\n", result);
6572  return result;
6573 }
6574 #endif /* BASH_PATTERN_SUBST */
6575 
6576 static int append_str_maybe_ifs_split(o_string *output, int n,
6577  int first_ch, const char *val)
6578 {
6579  if (!(first_ch & 0x80)) { /* unquoted $VAR */
6580  debug_printf_expand("unquoted '%s', output->o_escape:%d\n", val,
6581  !!(output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS));
6582  if (val && val[0])
6583  n = expand_on_ifs(output, n, val);
6584  } else { /* quoted "$VAR" */
6585  output->has_quoted_part = 1;
6586  debug_printf_expand("quoted '%s', output->o_escape:%d\n", val,
6587  !!(output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS));
6588  if (val && val[0])
6589  o_addQstr(output, val);
6590  }
6591  return n;
6592 }
6593 
6594 /* Handle <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>varname...<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> construct.
6595  */
6596 static NOINLINE int expand_one_var(o_string *output, int n,
6597  int first_ch, char *arg, char **pp)
6598 {
6599  const char *val;
6600  char *to_be_freed;
6601  char *p;
6602  char *var;
6603  char exp_op;
6604  char exp_save = exp_save; /* for compiler */
6605  char *exp_saveptr; /* points to expansion operator */
6606  char *exp_word = exp_word; /* for compiler */
6607  char arg0;
6608 
6609  val = NULL;
6610  to_be_freed = NULL;
6611  p = *pp;
6612  *p = '\0'; /* replace trailing SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL */
6613  var = arg;
6614  exp_saveptr = arg[1] ? strchr(VAR_ENCODED_SUBST_OPS, arg[1]) : NULL;
6615  arg0 = arg[0];
6616  arg[0] = (arg0 & 0x7f);
6617  exp_op = 0;
6618 
6619  if (arg[0] == '#' && arg[1] /* ${#...} but not ${#} */
6620  && (!exp_saveptr /* and ( not(${#<op_char>...}) */
6621  || (arg[2] == '\0' && strchr(SPECIAL_VARS_STR, arg[1])) /* or ${#C} "len of $C" ) */
6622  ) /* NB: skipping ^^^specvar check mishandles ${#::2} */
6623  ) {
6624  /* It must be length operator: ${#var} */
6625  var++;
6626  exp_op = 'L';
6627  } else {
6628  /* Maybe handle parameter expansion */
6629  if (exp_saveptr /* if 2nd char is one of expansion operators */
6630  && strchr(NUMERIC_SPECVARS_STR, arg[0]) /* 1st char is special variable */
6631  ) {
6632  /* ${?:0}, ${#[:]%0} etc */
6633  exp_saveptr = var + 1;
6634  } else {
6635  /* ${?}, ${var}, ${var:0}, ${var[:]%0} etc */
6636  exp_saveptr = var+1 + strcspn(var+1, VAR_ENCODED_SUBST_OPS);
6637  }
6638  exp_op = exp_save = *exp_saveptr;
6639  if (exp_op) {
6640  exp_word = exp_saveptr + 1;
6641  if (exp_op == ':') {
6642  exp_op = *exp_word++;
6643 //TODO: try ${var:} and ${var:bogus} in non-bash config
6644  if (BASH_SUBSTR
6645  && (!exp_op || !strchr(MINUS_PLUS_EQUAL_QUESTION, exp_op))
6646  ) {
6647  /* oops... it's ${var:N[:M]}, not ${var:?xxx} or some such */
6648  exp_op = ':';
6649  exp_word--;
6650  }
6651  }
6652  *exp_saveptr = '\0';
6653  } /* else: it's not an expansion op, but bare ${var} */
6654  }
6655 
6656  /* Look up the variable in question */
6657  if (isdigit(var[0])) {
6658  /* parse_dollar should have vetted var for us */
6659  int nn = xatoi_positive(var);
6660  if (nn < G.global_argc)
6661  val = G.global_argv[nn];
6662  /* else val remains NULL: $N with too big N */
6663  } else {
6664  switch (var[0]) {
6665  case '$': /* pid */
6666  val = utoa(G.root_pid);
6667  break;
6668  case '!': /* bg pid */
6669  val = G.last_bg_pid ? utoa(G.last_bg_pid) : "";
6670  break;
6671  case '?': /* exitcode */
6672  val = utoa(G.last_exitcode);
6673  break;
6674  case '#': /* argc */
6675  val = utoa(G.global_argc ? G.global_argc-1 : 0);
6676  break;
6677  case '-': { /* active options */
6678  /* Check set_mode() to see what option chars we support */
6679  char *cp;
6680  val = cp = G.optstring_buf;
6681  if (G.o_opt[OPT_O_ERREXIT])
6682  *cp++ = 'e';
6683  if (G_interactive_fd)
6684  *cp++ = 'i';
6685  if (G_x_mode)
6686  *cp++ = 'x';
6687  /* If G.o_opt[OPT_O_NOEXEC] is true,
6688  * commands read but are not executed,
6689  * so $- can not execute too, 'n' is never seen in $-.
6690  */
6691  if (G.opt_c)
6692  *cp++ = 'c';
6693  if (G.opt_s)
6694  *cp++ = 's';
6695  *cp = '\0';
6696  break;
6697  }
6698  default:
6699  val = get_local_var_value(var);
6700  }
6701  }
6702 
6703  /* Handle any expansions */
6704  if (exp_op == 'L') {
6705  reinit_unicode_for_hush();
6706  debug_printf_expand("expand: length(%s)=", val);
6707  val = utoa(val ? unicode_strlen(val) : 0);
6708  debug_printf_expand("%s\n", val);
6709  } else if (exp_op) {
6710  if (exp_op == '%' || exp_op == '#') {
6711  /* Standard-mandated substring removal ops:
6712  * ${parameter%word} - remove smallest suffix pattern
6713  * ${parameter%%word} - remove largest suffix pattern
6714  * ${parameter#word} - remove smallest prefix pattern
6715  * ${parameter##word} - remove largest prefix pattern
6716  *
6717  * Word is expanded to produce a glob pattern.
6718  * Then var's value is matched to it and matching part removed.
6719  */
6720  /* bash compat: if x is "" and no shrinking of it is possible,
6721  * inner ${...} is not evaluated. Example:
6722  * unset b; : ${a%${b=B}}; echo $b
6723  * assignment b=B only happens if $a is not "".
6724  */
6725  if (val && val[0]) {
6726  char *t;
6727  char *exp_exp_word;
6728  char *loc;
6729  unsigned scan_flags = pick_scan(exp_op, *exp_word);
6730  if (exp_op == *exp_word) /* ## or %% */
6731  exp_word++;
6732  debug_printf_expand("expand: exp_word:'%s'\n", exp_word);
6733  exp_exp_word = encode_then_expand_vararg(exp_word, /*handle_squotes:*/ 1, /*unbackslash:*/ 0);
6734  if (exp_exp_word)
6735  exp_word = exp_exp_word;
6736  debug_printf_expand("expand: exp_word:'%s'\n", exp_word);
6737  /*
6738  * HACK ALERT. We depend here on the fact that
6739  * G.global_argv and results of utoa and get_local_var_value
6740  * are actually in writable memory:
6741  * scan_and_match momentarily stores NULs there.
6742  */
6743  t = (char*)val;
6744  loc = scan_and_match(t, exp_word, scan_flags);
6745  debug_printf_expand("op:%c str:'%s' pat:'%s' res:'%s'\n", exp_op, t, exp_word, loc);
6746  free(exp_exp_word);
6747  if (loc) { /* match was found */
6748  if (scan_flags & SCAN_MATCH_LEFT_HALF) /* #[#] */
6749  val = loc; /* take right part */
6750  else /* %[%] */
6751  val = to_be_freed = xstrndup(val, loc - val); /* left */
6752  }
6753  }
6754  }
6755 #if BASH_PATTERN_SUBST
6756  else if (exp_op == '/' || exp_op == '\\') {
6757  /* It's ${var/[/]pattern[/repl]} thing.
6758  * Note that in encoded form it has TWO parts:
6759  * var/pattern<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>repl<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>
6760  * and if // is used, it is encoded as \:
6761  * var\pattern<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>repl<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>
6762  */
6763  /* bash compat: if var is "", both pattern and repl
6764  * are still evaluated, if it is unset, then not:
6765  * unset b; a=; : ${a/z/${b=3}}; echo $b # b=3
6766  * unset b; unset a; : ${a/z/${b=3}}; echo $b # b not set
6767  */
6768  if (val /*&& val[0]*/) {
6769  /* pattern uses non-standard expansion.
6770  * repl should be unbackslashed and globbed
6771  * by the usual expansion rules:
6772  * >az >bz
6773  * v='a bz'; echo "${v/a*z/a*z}" #prints "a*z"
6774  * v='a bz'; echo "${v/a*z/\z}" #prints "z"
6775  * v='a bz'; echo ${v/a*z/a*z} #prints "az"
6776  * v='a bz'; echo ${v/a*z/\z} #prints "z"
6777  * (note that a*z _pattern_ is never globbed!)
6778  */
6779  char *pattern, *repl, *t;
6780  pattern = encode_then_expand_vararg(exp_word, /*handle_squotes:*/ 1, /*unbackslash:*/ 0);
6781  if (!pattern)
6782  pattern = xstrdup(exp_word);
6783  debug_printf_varexp("pattern:'%s'->'%s'\n", exp_word, pattern);
6784  *p++ = SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL;
6785  exp_word = p;
6786  p = strchr(p, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6787  *p = '\0';
6788  repl = encode_then_expand_vararg(exp_word, /*handle_squotes:*/ 1, /*unbackslash:*/ 1);
6789  debug_printf_varexp("repl:'%s'->'%s'\n", exp_word, repl);
6790  /* HACK ALERT. We depend here on the fact that
6791  * G.global_argv and results of utoa and get_local_var_value
6792  * are actually in writable memory:
6793  * replace_pattern momentarily stores NULs there. */
6794  t = (char*)val;
6795  to_be_freed = replace_pattern(t,
6796  pattern,
6797  (repl ? repl : exp_word),
6798  exp_op);
6799  if (to_be_freed) /* at least one replace happened */
6800  val = to_be_freed;
6801  free(pattern);
6802  free(repl);
6803  } else {
6804  /* Unset variable always gives nothing */
6805  // a=; echo ${a/*/w} # "w"
6806  // unset a; echo ${a/*/w} # ""
6807  /* Just skip "replace" part */
6808  *p++ = SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL;
6809  p = strchr(p, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6810  *p = '\0';
6811  }
6812  }
6813 #endif /* BASH_PATTERN_SUBST */
6814  else if (exp_op == ':') {
6815 #if BASH_SUBSTR && ENABLE_FEATURE_SH_MATH
6816  /* It's ${var:N[:M]} bashism.
6817  * Note that in encoded form it has TWO parts:
6818  * var:N<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>M<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>
6819  */
6820  arith_t beg, len;
6821  unsigned vallen;
6822  const char *errmsg;
6823 
6824  beg = expand_and_evaluate_arith(exp_word, &errmsg);
6825  if (errmsg)
6826  goto empty_result;
6827  debug_printf_varexp("beg:'%s'=%lld\n", exp_word, (long long)beg);
6828  *p++ = SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL;
6829  exp_word = p;
6830  p = strchr(p, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
6831  *p = '\0';
6832  vallen = val ? strlen(val) : 0;
6833  if (beg < 0) {
6834  /* negative beg counts from the end */
6835  beg = (arith_t)vallen + beg;
6836  }
6837  /* If expansion will be empty, do not even evaluate len */
6838  if (!val || beg < 0 || beg > vallen) {
6839  /* Why > vallen, not >=? bash:
6840  * unset b; a=ab; : ${a:2:${b=3}}; echo $b # "", b=3 (!!!)
6841  * unset b; a=a; : ${a:2:${b=3}}; echo $b # "", b not set
6842  */
6843  goto empty_result;
6844  }
6845  len = expand_and_evaluate_arith(exp_word, &errmsg);
6846  if (errmsg)
6847  goto empty_result;
6848  debug_printf_varexp("len:'%s'=%lld\n", exp_word, (long long)len);
6849  debug_printf_varexp("from val:'%s'\n", val);
6850  if (len < 0) {
6851  /* in bash, len=-n means strlen()-n */
6852  len = (arith_t)vallen - beg + len;
6853  if (len < 0) /* bash compat */
6854  msg_and_die_if_script("%s: substring expression < 0", var);
6855  }
6856  if (len <= 0 || !val /*|| beg >= vallen*/) {
6857  empty_result:
6858  val = NULL;
6859  } else {
6860  /* Paranoia. What if user entered 9999999999999
6861  * which fits in arith_t but not int? */
6862  if (len > INT_MAX)
6863  len = INT_MAX;
6864  val = to_be_freed = xstrndup(val + beg, len);
6865  }
6866  debug_printf_varexp("val:'%s'\n", val);
6867 #else /* not (HUSH_SUBSTR_EXPANSION && FEATURE_SH_MATH) */
6868  msg_and_die_if_script("malformed ${%s:...}", var);
6869  val = NULL;
6870 #endif
6871  } else { /* one of "-=+?" */
6872  /* Standard-mandated substitution ops:
6873  * ${var?word} - indicate error if unset
6874  * If var is unset, word (or a message indicating it is unset
6875  * if word is null) is written to standard error
6876  * and the shell exits with a non-zero exit status.
6877  * Otherwise, the value of var is substituted.
6878  * ${var-word} - use default value
6879  * If var is unset, word is substituted.
6880  * ${var=word} - assign and use default value
6881  * If var is unset, word is assigned to var.
6882  * In all cases, final value of var is substituted.
6883  * ${var+word} - use alternative value
6884  * If var is unset, null is substituted.
6885  * Otherwise, word is substituted.
6886  *
6887  * Word is subjected to tilde expansion, parameter expansion,
6888  * command substitution, and arithmetic expansion.
6889  * If word is not needed, it is not expanded.
6890  *
6891  * Colon forms (${var:-word}, ${var:=word} etc) do the same,
6892  * but also treat null var as if it is unset.
6893  *
6894  * Word-splitting and single quote behavior:
6895  *
6896  * $ f() { for i; do echo "|$i|"; done; }
6897  *
6898  * $ x=; f ${x:?'x y' z}; echo $?
6899  * bash: x: x y z # neither f nor "echo $?" executes
6900  * (if interactive, bash does not exit, but merely aborts to prompt. $? is set to 1)
6901  * $ x=; f "${x:?'x y' z}"
6902  * bash: x: x y z # dash prints: dash: x: 'x y' z
6903  *
6904  * $ x=; f ${x:='x y' z}
6905  * |x|
6906  * |y|
6907  * |z|
6908  * $ x=; f "${x:='x y' z}"
6909  * |'x y' z|
6910  *
6911  * $ x=x; f ${x:+'x y' z}
6912  * |x y|
6913  * |z|
6914  * $ x=x; f "${x:+'x y' z}"
6915  * |'x y' z|
6916  *
6917  * $ x=; f ${x:-'x y' z}
6918  * |x y|
6919  * |z|
6920  * $ x=; f "${x:-'x y' z}"
6921  * |'x y' z|
6922  */
6923  int use_word = (!val || ((exp_save == ':') && !val[0]));
6924  if (exp_op == '+')
6925  use_word = !use_word;
6926  debug_printf_expand("expand: op:%c (null:%s) test:%i\n", exp_op,
6927  (exp_save == ':') ? "true" : "false", use_word);
6928  if (use_word) {
6929  if (exp_op == '+' || exp_op == '-') {
6930  /* ${var+word} - use alternative value */
6931  /* ${var-word} - use default value */
6932  n = encode_then_append_var_plusminus(output, n, exp_word,
6933  /*dquoted:*/ (arg0 & 0x80)
6934  );
6935  val = NULL;
6936  } else {
6937  /* ${var?word} - indicate error if unset */
6938  /* ${var=word} - assign and use default value */
6939  to_be_freed = encode_then_expand_vararg(exp_word,
6940  /*handle_squotes:*/ !(arg0 & 0x80),
6941  /*unbackslash:*/ 0
6942  );
6943  if (to_be_freed)
6944  exp_word = to_be_freed;
6945  if (exp_op == '?') {
6946  /* mimic bash message */
6947  msg_and_die_if_script("%s: %s",
6948  var,
6949  exp_word[0]
6950  ? exp_word
6951  : "parameter null or not set"
6952  /* ash has more specific messages, a-la: */
6953  /*: (exp_save == ':' ? "parameter null or not set" : "parameter not set")*/
6954  );
6955 //TODO: how interactive bash aborts expansion mid-command?
6956 //It aborts the entire line, returns to prompt:
6957 // $ f() { for i; do echo "|$i|"; done; }; x=; f "${x:?'x y' z}"; echo YO
6958 // bash: x: x y z
6959 // $
6960 // ("echo YO" is not executed, neither the f function call)
6961  } else {
6962  val = exp_word;
6963  }
6964  if (exp_op == '=') {
6965  /* ${var=[word]} or ${var:=[word]} */
6966  if (isdigit(var[0]) || var[0] == '#') {
6967  /* mimic bash message */
6968  msg_and_die_if_script("$%s: cannot assign in this way", var);
6969  val = NULL;
6970  } else {
6971  char *new_var = xasprintf("%s=%s", var, val);
6972  set_local_var0(new_var);
6973  }
6974  }
6975  }
6976  }
6977  } /* one of "-=+?" */
6978 
6979  *exp_saveptr = exp_save;
6980  } /* if (exp_op) */
6981 
6982  arg[0] = arg0;
6983  *pp = p;
6984 
6985  n = append_str_maybe_ifs_split(output, n, first_ch, val);
6986 
6987  free(to_be_freed);
6988  return n;
6989 }
6990 
6991 /* Expand all variable references in given string, adding words to list[]
6992  * at n, n+1,... positions. Return updated n (so that list[n] is next one
6993  * to be filled). This routine is extremely tricky: has to deal with
6994  * variables/parameters with whitespace, $* and $@, and constructs like
6995  * 'echo -$*-'. If you play here, you must run testsuite afterwards! */
6996 static NOINLINE int expand_vars_to_list(o_string *output, int n, char *arg)
6997 {
6998  /* output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD (0x80) if we are in
6999  * expansion of right-hand side of assignment == 1-element expand.
7000  */
7001  char cant_be_null = 0; /* only bit 0x80 matters */
7002  char *p;
7003 
7004  debug_printf_expand("expand_vars_to_list: arg:'%s' singleword:%x\n", arg,
7005  !!(output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD));
7006  debug_print_list("expand_vars_to_list[0]", output, n);
7007 
7008  while ((p = strchr(arg, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL)) != NULL) {
7009  char first_ch;
7010 #if ENABLE_FEATURE_SH_MATH
7011  char arith_buf[sizeof(arith_t)*3 + 2];
7012 #endif
7013 
7014  if (output->ended_in_ifs) {
7015  o_addchr(output, '\0');
7016  n = o_save_ptr(output, n);
7017  output->ended_in_ifs = 0;
7018  }
7019 
7020  o_addblock(output, arg, p - arg);
7021  debug_print_list("expand_vars_to_list[1]", output, n);
7022  arg = ++p;
7023  p = strchr(p, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
7024 
7025  /* Fetch special var name (if it is indeed one of them)
7026  * and quote bit, force the bit on if singleword expansion -
7027  * important for not getting v=$@ expand to many words. */
7028  first_ch = arg[0] | (output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD);
7029 
7030  /* Is this variable quoted and thus expansion can't be null?
7031  * "$@" is special. Even if quoted, it can still
7032  * expand to nothing (not even an empty string),
7033  * thus it is excluded. */
7034  if ((first_ch & 0x7f) != '@')
7035  cant_be_null |= first_ch;
7036 
7037  switch (first_ch & 0x7f) {
7038  /* Highest bit in first_ch indicates that var is double-quoted */
7039  case '*':
7040  case '@': {
7041  int i;
7042  if (!G.global_argv[1])
7043  break;
7044  i = 1;
7045  cant_be_null |= first_ch; /* do it for "$@" _now_, when we know it's not empty */
7046  if (!(first_ch & 0x80)) { /* unquoted $* or $@ */
7047  while (G.global_argv[i]) {
7048  n = expand_on_ifs(output, n, G.global_argv[i]);
7049  debug_printf_expand("expand_vars_to_list: argv %d (last %d)\n", i, G.global_argc - 1);
7050  if (G.global_argv[i++][0] && G.global_argv[i]) {
7051  /* this argv[] is not empty and not last:
7052  * put terminating NUL, start new word */
7053  o_addchr(output, '\0');
7054  debug_print_list("expand_vars_to_list[2]", output, n);
7055  n = o_save_ptr(output, n);
7056  debug_print_list("expand_vars_to_list[3]", output, n);
7057  }
7058  }
7059  } else
7060  /* If EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD, we handle assignment 'a=....$@.....'
7061  * and in this case should treat it like '$*' - see 'else...' below */
7062  if (first_ch == (char)('@'|0x80) /* quoted $@ */
7063  && !(output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD) /* not v="$@" case */
7064  ) {
7065  while (1) {
7066  o_addQstr(output, G.global_argv[i]);
7067  if (++i >= G.global_argc)
7068  break;
7069  o_addchr(output, '\0');
7070  debug_print_list("expand_vars_to_list[4]", output, n);
7071  n = o_save_ptr(output, n);
7072  }
7073  } else { /* quoted $* (or v="$@" case): add as one word */
7074  while (1) {
7075  o_addQstr(output, G.global_argv[i]);
7076  if (!G.global_argv[++i])
7077  break;
7078  if (G.ifs[0])
7079  o_addchr(output, G.ifs[0]);
7080  }
7081  output->has_quoted_part = 1;
7082  }
7083  break;
7084  }
7085  case SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL: {
7086  /* <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL><SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> */
7087  /* "Empty variable", used to make "" etc to not disappear */
7088  output->has_quoted_part = 1;
7089  cant_be_null = 0x80;
7090  arg++;
7091  break;
7092  }
7093  case SPECIAL_VAR_QUOTED_SVS:
7094  /* <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL><SPECIAL_VAR_QUOTED_SVS><SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> */
7095  /* "^C variable", represents literal ^C char (possible in scripts) */
7096  o_addchr(output, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL);
7097  arg++;
7098  break;
7099 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TICK
7100  case '`': {
7101  /* <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>`cmd<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> */
7102  o_string subst_result = NULL_O_STRING;
7103 
7104  *p = '\0'; /* replace trailing <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> */
7105  arg++;
7106  /* Can't just stuff it into output o_string,
7107  * expanded result may need to be globbed
7108  * and $IFS-split */
7109  debug_printf_subst("SUBST '%s' first_ch %x\n", arg, first_ch);
7110  G.last_exitcode = process_command_subs(&subst_result, arg);
7111  G.expand_exitcode = G.last_exitcode;
7112  debug_printf_subst("SUBST RES:%d '%s'\n", G.last_exitcode, subst_result.data);
7113  n = append_str_maybe_ifs_split(output, n, first_ch, subst_result.data);
7114  o_free(&subst_result);
7115  break;
7116  }
7117 #endif
7118 #if ENABLE_FEATURE_SH_MATH
7119  case '+': {
7120  /* <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>+arith<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> */
7121  arith_t res;
7122 
7123  arg++; /* skip '+' */
7124  *p = '\0'; /* replace trailing <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> */
7125  debug_printf_subst("ARITH '%s' first_ch %x\n", arg, first_ch);
7126  res = expand_and_evaluate_arith(arg, NULL);
7127  debug_printf_subst("ARITH RES '"ARITH_FMT"'\n", res);
7128  sprintf(arith_buf, ARITH_FMT, res);
7129  if (res < 0
7130  && first_ch == (char)('+'|0x80)
7131  /* && (output->o_expflags & EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS) */
7132  ) {
7133  /* Quoted negative ariths, like filename[0"$((-9))"],
7134  * should not be interpreted as glob ranges.
7135  * Convert leading '-' to '\-':
7136  */
7137  o_grow_by(output, 1);
7138  output->data[output->length++] = '\\';
7139  }
7140  o_addstr(output, arith_buf);
7141  break;
7142  }
7143 #endif
7144  default:
7145  /* <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>varname[ops]<SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL> */
7146  n = expand_one_var(output, n, first_ch, arg, &p);
7147  break;
7148  } /* switch (char after <SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL>) */
7149 
7150  /* Restore NULL'ed SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL.
7151  * Do the check to avoid writing to a const string. */
7152  if (*p != SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL)
7153  *p = SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL;
7154  arg = ++p;
7155  } /* end of "while (SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL is found) ..." */
7156 
7157  if (*arg) {
7158  /* handle trailing string */
7159  if (output->ended_in_ifs) {
7160  o_addchr(output, '\0');
7161  n = o_save_ptr(output, n);
7162  }
7163  debug_print_list("expand_vars_to_list[a]", output, n);
7164  /* this part is literal, and it was already pre-quoted
7165  * if needed (much earlier), do not use o_addQstr here!
7166  */
7167  o_addstr(output, arg);
7168  debug_print_list("expand_vars_to_list[b]", output, n);
7169  } else
7170  if (output->length == o_get_last_ptr(output, n) /* expansion is empty */
7171  && !(cant_be_null & 0x80) /* and all vars were not quoted */
7172  && !output->has_quoted_part
7173  ) {
7174  n--;
7175  /* allow to reuse list[n] later without re-growth */
7176  output->has_empty_slot = 1;
7177  }
7178 
7179  return n;
7180 }
7181 
7182 static char **expand_variables(char **argv, unsigned expflags)
7183 {
7184  int n;
7185  char **list;
7186  o_string output = NULL_O_STRING;
7187 
7188  output.o_expflags = expflags;
7189 
7190  n = 0;
7191  for (;;) {
7192  /* go to next list[n] */
7193  output.ended_in_ifs = 0;
7194  n = o_save_ptr(&output, n);
7195 
7196  if (!*argv)
7197  break;
7198 
7199  /* expand argv[i] */
7200  n = expand_vars_to_list(&output, n, *argv++);
7201  /* if (!output->has_empty_slot) -- need this?? */
7202  o_addchr(&output, '\0');
7203  }
7204  debug_print_list("expand_variables", &output, n);
7205 
7206  /* output.data (malloced in one block) gets returned in "list" */
7207  list = o_finalize_list(&output, n);
7208  debug_print_strings("expand_variables[1]", list);
7209  return list;
7210 }
7211 
7212 static char **expand_strvec_to_strvec(char **argv)
7213 {
7214  return expand_variables(argv, EXP_FLAG_GLOB | EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS);
7215 }
7216 
7217 #if defined(CMD_SINGLEWORD_NOGLOB) || defined(CMD_TEST2_SINGLEWORD_NOGLOB)
7218 static char **expand_strvec_to_strvec_singleword_noglob(char **argv)
7219 {
7220  return expand_variables(argv, EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD);
7221 }
7222 #endif
7223 
7224 /* Used for expansion of right hand of assignments,
7225  * $((...)), heredocs, variable expansion parts.
7226  *
7227  * NB: should NOT do globbing!
7228  * "export v=/bin/c*; env | grep ^v=" outputs "v=/bin/c*"
7229  */
7230 static char *expand_string_to_string(const char *str, int EXP_flags, int do_unbackslash)
7231 {
7232 #if !BASH_PATTERN_SUBST && !ENABLE_HUSH_CASE
7233  const int do_unbackslash = 1;
7234  const int EXP_flags = EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS;
7235 #endif
7236  char *argv[2], **list;
7237 
7238  debug_printf_expand("string_to_string<='%s'\n", str);
7239  /* This is generally an optimization, but it also
7240  * handles "", which otherwise trips over !list[0] check below.
7241  * (is this ever happens that we actually get str="" here?)
7242  */
7243  if (!strchr(str, SPECIAL_VAR_SYMBOL) && !strchr(str, '\\')) {
7244  //TODO: Can use on strings with \ too, just unbackslash() them?
7245  debug_printf_expand("string_to_string(fast)=>'%s'\n", str);
7246  return xstrdup(str);
7247  }
7248 
7249  argv[0] = (char*)str;
7250  argv[1] = NULL;
7251  list = expand_variables(argv, EXP_flags | EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD);
7252  if (!list[0]) {
7253  /* Example where it happens:
7254  * x=; echo ${x:-"$@"}
7255  */
7256  ((char*)list)[0] = '\0';
7257  } else {
7258  if (HUSH_DEBUG)
7259  if (list[1])
7260  bb_simple_error_msg_and_die("BUG in varexp2");
7261  /* actually, just move string 2*sizeof(char*) bytes back */
7262  overlapping_strcpy((char*)list, list[0]);
7263  if (do_unbackslash)
7264  unbackslash((char*)list);
7265  }
7266  debug_printf_expand("string_to_string=>'%s'\n", (char*)list);
7267  return (char*)list;
7268 }
7269 
7270 #if 0
7271 static char* expand_strvec_to_string(char **argv)
7272 {
7273  char **list;
7274 
7275  list = expand_variables(argv, EXP_FLAG_SINGLEWORD);
7276  /* Convert all NULs to spaces */
7277  if (list[0]) {
7278  int n = 1;
7279  while (list[n]) {
7280  if (HUSH_DEBUG)
7281  if (list[n-1] + strlen(list[n-1]) + 1 != list[n])
7282  bb_error_msg_and_die("BUG in varexp3");
7283  /* bash uses ' ' regardless of $IFS contents */
7284  list[n][-1] = ' ';
7285  n++;
7286  }
7287  }
7288  overlapping_strcpy((char*)list, list[0] ? list[0] : "");
7289  debug_printf_expand("strvec_to_string='%s'\n", (char*)list);
7290  return (char*)list;
7291 }
7292 #endif
7293 
7294 static char **expand_assignments(char **argv, int count)
7295 {
7296  int i;
7297  char **p;
7298 
7299  G.expanded_assignments = p = NULL;
7300  /* Expand assignments into one string each */
7301  for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
7302  p = add_string_to_strings(p,
7303  expand_string_to_string(argv[i],
7304  EXP_FLAG_ESC_GLOB_CHARS,
7305  /*unbackslash:*/ 1
7306  )
7307  );
7308  G.expanded_assignments = p;
7309  }
7310  G.expanded_assignments = NULL;
7311  return p;
7312 }
7313 
7314 
7315 static void switch_off_special_sigs(unsigned mask)
7316 {
7317  unsigned sig = 0;
7318  while ((mask >>= 1) != 0) {
7319  sig++;
7320  if (!(mask & 1))
7321  continue;
7322 #if ENABLE_HUSH_TRAP
7323  if (G_traps) {
7324  if (G_traps[sig] && !G_traps[sig][0])
7325  /* trap is '', has to remain SIG_IGN */
7326  continue;
7327  free(G_traps[sig]);
7328  G_traps[sig] = NULL;
7329  }
7330 #endif
7331  /* We are here only if no trap or trap was not '' */
7332  install_sighandler(sig, SIG_DFL);
7333  }
7334 }
7335 
7336 #if BB_MMU
7337 /* never called */
7338 void re_execute_shell(char ***to_free, const char *s,
7339  char *g_argv0, char **g_argv,
7340  char **builtin_argv) NORETURN;
7341 
7342 static void reset_traps_to_defaults(void)
7343 {
7344  /* This function is always called in a child shell
7345  * after fork (not vfork, NOMMU doesn't use this function).
7346  */
7347  IF_HUSH_TRAP(unsigned sig;)
7348  unsigned mask;
7349 
7350  /* Child shells are not interactive.
7351  * SIGTTIN/SIGTTOU/SIGTSTP should not have special handling.
7352  * Testcase: (while :; do :; done) + ^Z should background.
7353  * Same goes for SIGTERM, SIGHUP, SIGINT.
7354  */
7355  mask = (G.special_sig_mask & SPECIAL_INTERACTIVE_SIGS) | G_fatal_sig_mask;
7356  if (!G_traps && !mask)
7357  return; /* already no traps and no special sigs */
7358 
7359  /* Switch off special sigs */
7360  switch_off_special_sigs(mask);
7361 # if ENABLE_HUSH_JOB
7362  G_fatal_sig_mask = 0;
7363 # endif
7364  G.special_sig_mask &= ~SPECIAL_INTERACTIVE_SIGS;
7365  /* SIGQUIT,SIGCHLD and maybe SPECIAL_JOBSTOP_SIGS
7366  * remain set in G.special_sig_mask */
7367 
7368 # if ENABLE_HUSH_TRAP
7369  if (!G_traps)
7370  return;
7371 
7372  /* Reset all sigs to default except ones with empty traps */
7373  for (sig = 0; sig < NSIG; sig++) {
7374  if (!G_traps[sig])
7375  continue; /* no trap: nothing to do */
7376  if (!G_traps[sig][0])
7377  continue; /* empty trap: has to remain SIG_IGN */
7378  /* sig has non-empty trap, reset it: */
7379  free(G_traps[sig]);
7380  G_traps[sig] = NULL;
7381  /* There is no signal for trap 0 (EXIT) */
7382  if (sig == 0)
7383  continue;
7384  install_sighandler(sig, pick_sighandler(sig));
7385  }
7386 # endif
7387 }
7388 
7389 #else /* !BB_MMU */
7390 
7391 static void re_execute_shell(char ***to_free, const char *s,
7392  char *g_argv0, char **g_argv,
7393  char **builtin_argv) NORETURN;
7394 static void re_execute_shell(char ***to_free, const char *s,
7395  char *g_argv0, char **g_argv,
7396  char **builtin_argv)
7397 {
7398 # define NOMMU_HACK_FMT ("-$%x:%x:%x:%x:%x:%llx" IF_HUSH_LOOPS(":%x"))
7399  /* delims + 2 * (number of bytes in printed hex numbers) */
7400  char param_buf[sizeof(NOMMU_HACK_FMT) + 2 * (sizeof(int)*6 + sizeof(long long)*1)];
7401  char *heredoc_argv[4];
7402  struct variable *cur;
7403 # if ENABLE_HUSH_FUNCTIONS
7404  struct function *funcp;
7405 # endif
7406  char **argv, **pp;
7407  unsigned cnt;
7408  unsigned long long empty_trap_mask;
7409 
7410  if (!g_argv0) { /* heredoc */
7411  argv = heredoc_argv;
7412  argv[0] = (char *) G.argv0_for_re_execing;
7413  argv[1] = (char *) "-<";
7414  argv[2] = (char *) s;
7415  argv[3] = NULL;
7416  pp = &argv[3]; /* used as pointer to empty environment */
7417  goto do_exec;
7418  }
7419 
7420  cnt = 0;
7421  pp = builtin_argv;
7422  if (pp) while (*pp++)
7423  cnt++;
7424 
7425  empty_trap_mask = 0;
7426  if (G_traps) {
7427  int sig;
7428  for (sig = 1; sig < NSIG; sig++) {
7429  if (G_traps[sig] && !G_traps[sig][0])
7430  empty_trap_mask |= 1LL << sig;
7431  }
7432  }
7433 
7434  sprintf(param_buf, NOMMU_HACK_FMT
7435  , (unsigned) G.root_pid
7436  , (unsigned) G.root_ppid
7437  , (unsigned) G.last_bg_pid
7438  , (unsigned) G.last_exitcode
7439  , cnt
7440  , empty_trap_mask
7441  IF_HUSH_LOOPS(, G.depth_of_loop)
7442  );
7443 # undef NOMMU_HACK_FMT
7444  /* 1:hush 2:-$<pid>:<pid>:<exitcode>:<etc...> <vars...> <funcs...>
7445  * 3:-c 4:<cmd> 5:<arg0> <argN...> 6:NULL
7446  */
7447  cnt += 6;
7448  for (cur = G.top_var; cur; cur = cur->next) {
7449  if (!cur->flg_export || cur->flg_read_only)
7450  cnt += 2;
7451  }
7452 # if ENABLE_HUSH_FUNCTIONS
7453  for (funcp = G.top_func; funcp; funcp = funcp->next)
7454  cnt += 3;
7455 # endif
7456  pp = g_argv;
7457  while (*pp++)
7458  cnt++;
7459  *to_free = argv = pp = xzalloc(sizeof(argv[0]) * cnt);
7460  *pp++ = (char *) G.argv0_for_re_execing;
7461  *pp++ = param_buf;
7462  for (cur = G.top_var; cur; cur = cur->next) {
7463  if (strcmp(cur->varstr, hush_version_str) == 0)
7464  continue;
7465  if (cur->flg_read_only) {
7466  *pp++ = (char *) "-R";
7467  *pp++ = cur->varstr;
7468  } else if (!cur->flg_export) {
7469  *pp++ = (char *) "-V";
7470  *pp++ = cur->varstr;
7471  }
7472  }
7473 # if ENABLE_HUSH_FUNCTIONS
7474  for (funcp = G.top_func; funcp; funcp = funcp->next) {
7475  *pp++ = (char *) "-F";
7476  *pp++ = funcp->name;
7477  *pp++ = funcp->body_as_string;
7478  }
7479 # endif
7480  /* We can pass activated traps here. Say, -Tnn:trap_string
7481  *
7482  * However, POSIX says that subshells reset signals with traps
7483  * to SIG_DFL.
7484  * I tested bash-3.2 and it not only does that with true subshells
7485  * of the form ( list ), but with any forked children shells.
7486  * I set trap "echo W" WINCH; and then tried:
7487  *
7488  * { echo 1; sleep 20; echo 2; } &
7489  * while true; do echo 1; sleep 20; echo 2; break; done &
7490  * true | { echo 1; sleep 20; echo 2; } | cat
7491  *
7492  * In all these cases sending SIGWINCH to the child shell
7493  * did not run the trap. If I add trap "echo V" WINCH;
7494  * _inside_ group (just before echo 1), it works.
7495  *
7496  * I conclude it means we don't need to pass active traps here.
7497  */
7498  *pp++ = (char *) "-c";
7499  *pp++ = (char *) s;
7500  if (builtin_argv) {
7501  while (*++builtin_argv)
7502  *pp++ = *builtin_argv;
